cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Customer Communications?

hero.title:
Stop Juggling Apps
Unify Every Customer
Call, WhatsApp, and Chat
in One Simple Inbox.
hero.titleWithGradient: Stop Juggling Apps. <1>Unify Every Customer</1> Call, Text, WhatsApp, and Chat in One Simple Inbox.
hero.description: Seasalt.ai is the all-in-one contact center built for small businesses. Automate support, capture every lead, and manage all your conversations from a single screen.
hero.developerMessage: Seasalt.ai brings developers an agentic communication tool for the following <1>tool use</1>:

features.mainTitle: The Omni-Channel Copiloted Contact Center for SMEs
features.mainDescription: Seamlessly blend AI automation with human expertise across all channels. Empower your team to deliver exceptional service and drive growth.

omniChannel.title: Unified Omni-Channel Inbox
omniChannel.description: Never miss a lead. See every customer interaction from every channel in one unified view, enabling seamless human-AI collaboration and saving your team 5+ hours per week.

aiVoicebot.title: AI Voicebot & Chatbot
aiVoicebot.description: Your first digital employee works 24/7. Automate up to 80% of routine queries, book 5+ appointments daily, and seamlessly handoff to human agents when needed.

voiceWhatsapp.title: Native Voice & WhatsApp Integration
voiceWhatsapp.description: Serve every customer on their preferred channel, seamlessly. Instantly see WhatsApp chat history when they call.

outboundMarketing.title: Outbound Marketing Campaigns
outboundMarketing.description: Create seamless, closed-loop customer journeys. Launch targeted campaigns and manage all replies on the same platform.

enterpriseSecurity.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
enterpriseSecurity.description: HIPAA-compliant solution with bank-level encryption. Trust your customer data is always protected.

predictablePricing.title: Simple, Predictable Pricing
predictablePricing.description: Budget with confidence. Transparent pricing means you know exactly what you'll pay each month.

testimonial.quote: I recommend Seasalt.ai for its powerful knowledge base system and omni-channel support!
testimonial.author: — Solution Architect Review

howItWorks.title: Get Started in 3 Simple Steps
howItWorks.description1: Transform your customer communications in minutes, not months.
howItWorks.description2: No complex setup or technical knowledge required.

connectYourChannels.title: Connect Your Channels
connectYourChannels.description: Link your phone, WhatsApp, SMS, website chat, and social media in minutes. No technical expertise required.

automateRoutineWork.title: Automate Routine Work
automateRoutineWork.description: Set up AI to handle common questions like "Where's my order?" and book appointments automatically.

unifyYourTeam.title: Unify Your Team
unifyYourTeam.description: Your team sees the complete conversation history when customers switch from chat to phone calls.

useCases.title: Powerful Use Cases for Every Business Need
useCases.description: From contact centers to marketing campaigns, see how Seasalt.ai adapts to your specific business requirements with enterprise-grade features in a simple, unified platform.

contactCenter.headline: Professional Contact Center with Full Call Management

virtualReceptionist.description: Deploy an intelligent voicebot that works around the clock to capture inbound calls and qualify leads.

smsMarketing.description: Execute professional SMS marketing campaigns with high deliverability and compliance.

whatsappBusiness.description: Launch targeted WhatsApp campaigns using the official WhatsApp Business Platform.

problemSolution.title: Losing Leads in a Maze of Apps and Inboxes?
problemSolution.description: Your customers are trying to reach you everywhere. A missed message is a missed sale. Seasalt.ai brings all your communications into one place, so you never miss an opportunity.

fragmented.title: Fragmented Conversations
fragmented.description: Jumping between WhatsApp, phone logs, and web chat creates chaos and wastes time.

lostRevenue.title: Lost Revenue
lostRevenue.description: Missed messages after-hours and slow responses mean lost leads and frustrated customers.

operational.title: Operational Overload
operational.description: Your team is stretched thin managing too many tools instead of focusing on customers.

marketing.title: Copilot Your Marketing Campaigns
marketing.description: Acquire more customers with AI-driven outbound campaigns and smart lead nurturing.

support.title: Autopilot Your Customer Support
support.description: Reduce support costs with 24/7 AI agents handling routine queries and seamless human handoff.

human.title: Never Lose the Human Touch
human.description: Choose your automation level: Human-only, AI Copilot, or Full Autopilot based on your needs.

enterprise.title: Need Something Custom?
enterprise.description: We offer custom enterprise solutions including on-premise deployment, advanced security features, and dedicated support teams.

questions.question: Is the free plan really free forever?
questions.answer: Yes! Our free plan includes 1 human agent for life with unlimited conversations, chat history, and contacts. No credit card required, no hidden fees.

questions.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan anytime?
questions.answer: Absolutely! You can change your plan at any time. Upgrades take effect immediately, and downgrades take effect at the end of your current billing cycle.

questions.question: What happens to my data if I cancel?
questions.answer: You own your data. You can export all your chat history, contacts, and knowledge base content at any time, even on the free plan.

questions.question: Do you offer custom pricing for large enterprises?
questions.answer: Yes! We offer custom enterprise solutions with volume discounts, dedicated support, and specialized features. Contact our sales team for a personalized quote.

knowledgeBase.title: Powerful Knowledge Base
knowledgeBase.subtitle: Upload 30+ file types and let AI provide rich, contextual responses with cards, buttons, images, and videos.

dropzone.title: Drop your files here
dropzone.description: Support for PDF, Word, Excel, images, videos, and more
